data.name: Rheksetor
data.detailed_description:
Explore the world of Rheksetor!

Harvest resources, build a base of operations, and defend your city!

Rheksetor is a real time city defense game with classic RTS, city building, and tower defense roots, and many different planned and potential features.

Current Features / Mechanics:
  • Multiplayer co-op via Steam
  • Solo mode
  • Harvest vegetation and minerals from the world
  • Simple plot-based base-building system with building preview menu
  • Elegant, streamlined interface for smooth gameplay / interaction

Planned Features:
  • A powerful resource system allowing devices to produce, store, and process resources for the player
  • Transport vehicles and harvesting craft, with garages / hangars to store them
  • Wider range of zone types, offering different aesthetics and challenges
  • Various loot drops to customize and improve your colony (including set items)
  • Various enemies which will challenge your foothold in the world

Potential Features:
  • Combat mechanics that fit the theme of each element (frost slows, fire burns over time, blood drains, etc)
  • Tech trees for structures, allowing a wider range of progression choices
  • Aesthetic theme packs to personalize your experience
  • A rich story driven campaign
  • (likely) special themed updates for major holidays

data.short_description: Harvest resources, build structures, and defend your base!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 1.5 GIGAHERTZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 900 series or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 1.5 GIGAHERTZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 900 series or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
